City Night

City Night Template

This documentation is last updated on 01 February 2017.

Thank you for purchasing this HTML template.

If you like this template, Please support us by rating this template with 5 stars (How to rate?)

Directories

  • images

    This folder contains all the images of City Night HTML template.

  • css

    This folder contains all the CSS files of City Night HTML template.

  • js

    This folder has all javascript files for various template features.

  • fonts

    This folder has all fonts used in the template.

  • Plugins

    This folder has all jQuery Scripts used in the template.

Files

  • index.html

    Home page

  • property-liting.html

    Property Listing variation 1

  • property-liting-with-sidebar.html

    Property Listing variation 2

  • property-map-view.html

    Property Listing variation 3

  • blog.html

    Blog Page

  • blog-grid.html

    Blog Page Grid Variation

  • contact.html

    Contact Page

  • contact-var-two.html

    Contact Page Variation 2
